channel.title: Unban from Discord
channel.description:
Can any Mod Unban me from the Discord ? I got banned because i was using a cracked Version but now i got the Official Version from Steam so it would be nice to Unban me. My Discord Name is t1ggy#3633.
If you want any proof that i got the game let me know.

item.title: Unban from Discord
item.dc:creator: @EightBitRanger Eight Bit Ranger
item.description:
@EightBitRanger wrote:

Serves you right for using the cracked version. Good on you for buying the game eventually, but that doesnâ€™t absolve you from pirating the game to begin with.
